name: Flick Cola
description:
Flick Cola,
The Simplest and The Most Beautiful game.

This is similar to Curling.
But it's more easier,
more speedy,
more beautiful,
and it's more intuitive.

You'll be able to enjoy the most thrilling sport just by throwing a coin.
Alone or with friends.

* How to play
Throw a coin as close as possible to the cola line.
the nearest coin to the cola line will win a game.

* Get bonus points
Cola : A coin that catches the cola line can get six times the bets from the other players.
Cider : When a coin's cider area overlaps with another coin’s, the player of the nearest coin to the cola line will get twice the bets from the player of the other overlapped coin.
Crash : When a coin catches another coin, the player will get twice the bets from the caught player.
Cola Crash : When a coin catches another coin, the player will get ten times the bets from the caught player.

Now is the time to enjoy the simplest and the most wonderful sports.
